audioText: Nous avons vus tous les chats du refuge hier avant l'adoption.
question: What did they see at the shelter yesterday?
options: All the cats before the adoption event
All the dogs before the adoption event
All the birds before the adoption event
All the rabbits before the adoption event
explanation: The text states 'Nous avons vus tous les chats du refuge hier avant l'adoption' - We saw all the cats at the shelter yesterday before the adoption. The past participle 'vus' agrees with the direct object 'chats' (masculine plural).
